posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Just a couple of thoughts looking at Orion's putative build, if you don't mind (still assuming a full level 20 Monk).

If we drop STR down to 17 (finishing at 22) and CON to 14, then DEX can be lifted to 10 and INT to 13, it only comes at the cost of 20 hit points, while giving an extra 46 skill points and the ability to take Expertise, as well as raising the AC by 1 (19 naked). I'll come to the saves in a moment.

If we then play around with the feats a bit - taking Luck of Heroes and either Expertise or Blind Fighting at level 1, Weapon Focus at 3, the other of the first two at 6, Iron Will or Great Fortitude at 9, Improved Critical at 12, the other save bump at 15 and Toughness at 18, then we end up with final saves of Fort 17, Will 16, and Reflex 17.

As far as the skills go, I'd keep Discipline and Listen maxed and Tumble at 20, then I'd think about cross-classing Spellcraft to 9 (10) for an extra +2 to saves vs spells and maxing Concentration for resisting taunts (if applicable). That would still leave 11 points for a bit of other stuff - such as cross-classing Search or Disable Trap, Lore or Heal. If taunts aren't anything to be worried about, the total of 34 remaining sps could be used to split between Hide and Move Silently.

Just a few thoughts.

Of course, if we want to be more aggressive/ brutal, taking a Monk 16/ Fighter 4 (for Weapon Specialization mostly, but also 2 other bonus feats, +1 BAB - meaning an extra attack per round as well as being handy in itself, more damage, and 8 more hps). But there are costs - AC, saves and sps will all suffer, as well as losing self concealment, immunity to mind spells, and DR 20/+1. But only you can decide on your priorities, StrelOk.

Go well - cheers!
